EmailTemplate.name: 201803_Americas_Email_JetWave_Demo_Van Nuys_WJA_JRD.201803_Americas_Email_JetWav
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Honeywell JetWave™ Demo at Clay Lacy Aviation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://westernjetaviation.com/]]>
Dear Valued Western Jet Aviation Customer,
Experience Honeywell's premier, Ka-band, in-flight connectivity solution, JetWave™, as we stream videos, live television and more on our Falcon 7X at Clay Lacy Aviation in Van Nuys, California on April 2.
Clay Lacy Aviation – South Campus Lounge 7285 Valjean Avenue Van Nuys, CA 91406
While you’re there, get an in-depth view of the Honeywell GoDirect™ suite of services and apps as we take you into the cabin and show you how to maximize your connection speeds from anywhere around the world.
Honeywell staff will be onsite for this event and will be ready to discuss comprehensive financing options for all customers.
As an added bonus, Western Jet Aviation customers who are interested in adding new functionality to their cabin are encouraged to join Western Jet Aviation at their facility after this event to see Honeywell's state-of-the-art cabin management system, Ovation Select®.
You don't want to miss this great opportunity. Schedule your demo today.
SCHEDULE MY DEMO <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CPQPM6K]]>
